original: Anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni
analyzed: anāgāmissa puggalassa pañcorambhāgiyāni sayojanāni pahīnāni pañcuddhambhāgiyāni

original: saṁyojanāni appahīnāni, ito cutassa tattha upapannassa tahiṁ phaluppatti, tahiṁ bhāroharaṇaṁ,
analyzed: sayojanāni appahīnāni itas cutassa tattha upapannassa tahim phala uppatti tahim

original: tahiṁ dukkhapariññātaṁ, tahiṁ kilesappahānaṁ, tahiṁ nirodhasacchikiriyā, tahiṁ akuppapaṭivedho;
analyzed: tahim dukkha pariññāta tahim kilesa ppahāna tahim nirodha sacchikiriyā tahim akuppa paṭivedho
kenaṭṭhena vadesi
na atthi devesu brahmacariya vāso ti

original: Handa hi anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti.

original: Arahā bhavena bhavaṁ gacchati, gatiyā gatiṁ gacchati, saṁsārena saṁsāraṁ gacchati, upapattiyā upapattiṁ gacchatīti?

original: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjatīti?

bhāroharaṇāya puna maggam bhāveti iti

original: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjatīti?
analyzed: anāgāmī puggalo kata karaṇīyaḥ bhāvita bhāvanaḥ a pariññāta dukkhaḥ a pahīna kileso a sacchikata nirodhaḥ a paṭividdha akuppo tattha upapajjati iti

akuppa paṭivedhāya puna maggam bhāveti iti

original: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano anohaṭabhāro tattha upapajjati, na ca bhāroharaṇāya puna maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: anāgāmī puggalo kata karaṇīyaḥ bhāvita bhāvanaḥ anohaṭa bhāro tattha upapajjati na ca bhāroharaṇāya puna maggam bhāveti iti
āmantā
anohaṭa bhāro ca tattha parinibbāyati iti
na ha ivam vattabbe

original: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyo bhāvitabhāvano apariññātadukkho appahīnakileso asacchikatanirodho appaṭividdhākuppo tattha upapajjati, na ca akuppapaṭivedhāya puna maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: anāgāmī puggalo kata karaṇīyaḥ bhāvita bhāvanaḥ a pariññāta dukkhaḥ appahīna kilesaḥ asacchikata nirodhaḥ appaṭividdha akuppo tattha upapajjati na ca akuppa paṭivedhāya puna maggam bhāveti iti
āmantā
a paṭividdha akuppaḥ ca tattha parinibbāyati iti
na ha ivam vattabbe

original: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā kālaṁ karoti, evamevaṁ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalaṁ sacchikarotīti.
analyzed: yathā migaḥ sallena viddhaḥ dūram pi gantvā kālam karoti evam evam anāgāmī puggalaḥ idha bhāvitena maggena tattha phalam sacchikaroti iti

original: Yathā migo sallena viddho dūrampi gantvā sasallova kālaṁ karoti, evamevaṁ anāgāmī puggalo idha bhāvitena maggena tattha sasallova parinibbāyatīti?
analyzed: yathā migaḥ sallena viddhaḥ dūram pi gantvā sa sallaḥ iva kālam karoti evam evam anāgāmī puggalaḥ idha bhāvitena maggena tattha sa sallaḥ iva parinibbāyati iti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe
